channel.title: Victim [Class Suggestion] Neutral
channel.description:
Day Ability none
Night Ability 1 Spread rumors - You are spreading rumors to others making them not listen to the king (they cant hear what King is saying for one day) and you occupy them infinite
Night Ability 2 Shaming - If you spread rumors 3 times you can make king ashamed and he cant speak for a day and he cant accuse anyone for treason for day Use - 1
Lore: He always hated King no one knows why - he want to kill him but not the easy way He want to turn everyone againts him TODO
Goal - Accuse for the treason King and execute him Comments: Some weird kind of Exe from Town of salem Wild Achievement Bullied become the bully - After death of the king become one Justice is served - Accuse King for treason and kill him

infinite

He want to turn everyone againts him
